features: 24-HOUR ODOR PROTECTION: Schmidt's Signature Fresh Rain & Birch 100% Natural Origin Ingredient Deodorant provides up to 24 hours of protection against body odor
PLANT & MINERAL-BASED DEODORANT: This deodorant is formulated with Magnesium Hydroxide for odor control and essential oils for a rich, luxurious aroma
REFRESHING FRESHNESS: This deodorant features a premium 100% natural fragrance to keep you feeling fresh and energized
SAFE FORMULA: This deodorant has been formulated with no aluminum salts, artificial fragrance, propylene glycol, phthalates, or parabens
HOW TO USE: Hold this deodorant stick momentarily to skin to soften on contact with body heat. Gently apply a small amount to the underarms for a refreshing day ahead
CRUELTY-FREE: With this vegan deodorant, we're proud to be certified Cruelty-Free by Leaping Bunny and certified Vegan by Vegan Action
body.description: Schmidt's Fresh Rain & Birch Deodorant is powered by 100% Certified Natural Origin Ingredients, as certified by Ecocert. This plant and mineral-based natural deodorant is formulated with magnesium hydroxide for odor control and essential oils for a premium fragrance. This 100% Natural Origin Ingredient deodorant formula offers 24-hour odor protection to keep you fresh while also being gentle on skin. All of our Schmidt’s deodorant sticks require only a small amount of application for great results. To use, hold the natural deodorant stick momentarily to skin to soften on contact with body heat. Gently apply a small amount of this vegan deodorant to dry, clean underarms to keep you feeling fresh all day. Do not apply to irritated, damaged, or freshly shaved skin. Our certified vegan and cruelty-free deodorant NEVER contains aluminum salts, artificial fragrance, filler ingredients, propylene glycol, phthalates, or parabens. This deodorant is the best natural deodorant for men and women. Our award-winning Unisex deodorants have over 20,000 5-Star reviews*. We have a scent for everyone. *Based on the reviews of Schmidt's deodorant products sold across online retailers between January 2018 - July 2022.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Schmidt's brand – Listed as animal test–free by PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies program, 2022.

Natural Deodorant that Actually Works • Coconut oil provides a smooth feel, helps with skin nourishment. •Magnesium Hydroxide for odor control. •Essential Oils for a rich, luxurious aroma. OUR NATURAL DEODORANTS NEVER CONTAIN • Aluminum Salts • Artificial Fragrance • Filler Ingredients • Parabens • Propylene Glycol • Phthalates. Regardless of scent or formula. All of our products are 100% vegan. We're leaping Bunny certified Cruelty-Free and proud to say never test our products on animals. Schmidt's brand - Listed as animal test-free by PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies program, 2022.

Schmidt's Signature Rose & Vanilla Natural Deodorant, 3.25 oz Schmidt's Signature Grapefruit & Apricot Natural Deodorant, 2.65 oz Schmidt's Rose & Vanilla Natural Deodorant Spray, 3.2 oz Main Benefit Schmidt's Signature Rose & Vanilla Natural Deodorant is formulated to be gentle on skin with a sweet, natural fragrance. This plant and mineral-based deodorant is made with 100% certified natural origin ingredients like essential oils for a rich, luxurious aroma. Schmidt's Rose & Vanilla Natural Deodorant Spray helps neutralize odor and keep you fresh with long-lasting odor protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product is great after a week of use
reviews.reviewText: I think this product is great after only about a week of use. I like it better than my last activated charcoal deodorant that I’ve been using for over a year (history below). The application is a bit annoying but I’ve been used to getting my deodorant from a small glass jar so this stick isn’t really a big deal to me. My biggest concern going in was the smell. I was pleasantly surprised that I enjoyed the scent more than my prior deodorants. I notice a slight citrus overtone when I put it on and it fades throughout the morning. I was afraid that the stronger smell would be noticeable by those around me but my wife could hardly smell it through a t-shirt with her nose right up close. The crazy thing is that at the end of a full day 10-12 hours after application I notice a baby powder scent. It’s mild and I love it. Laying on the couch at 10pm I still smell fresh and my arm pits seem softer than before. I’m only a week in and things could change but baring any major changes I’ve found my new deodorant.Finally the price is a great value compared to my previous choice. Larger amount for 40% less cost.My biggest fear with these small natural deodorant companies is that they will have supply chain issues, change the formula, or just go away. Schmidt’s seems to have a following and a robust lineup of products so maybe my concerns will be unfounded.Background: After years of wearing Antiperspirant/Deodorant from major brands and finally Mitchum's and still sweating I decided to switch to a deodorant only. My first was Arm and Hammer's Essentials. It worked great and had a pleasant smell which wasn't strong smelling (I really liked the smell). The only problem with A&H Essentials was I started noticing a red rash in my arm pits. It didn't itch it wasn't raised my skin was just red. I kept using it for a while because who sees my armpits other than me. I mentioned it during a doctor's visit and they just said: sounds like you're allergic to something in it.I remembered seeing the Piper Wia pitch on Shark Tank so I went to their site and bought a container. It was pretty pricey compared to what I was used to spending and I was scooping it out of a little glass jar (LOVE!!! those little glass jars for reuse) but I liked it. So I've been using Piper Wia for over a year and I've even recommended it to other people. I started ordering it from amazon as a prime item for a couple of dollars more than the PW site because it seemed to take forever to ship and deliver. It was worth the $2 premium to get it faster. I started noticing inconsistencies in the product. It seemed harder and darker in color when I opened it up and I thought the scent had changed a little. It wasn’t a huge deal and I chalked the first two up to the fact that it contained coconut oil which tends to solidify at colder temps. Then I started to notice that by the end of the day I was starting to notice my body odor using PW. I even felt like sweat had an odd smell almost spicy but I thought it could be my diet or some other factor.My last amazon order was delayed and I was almost out of PW. Then I was out and using my backup in my overnight bag so I went on the hunt for something new. I started my search for other Deodorants containing activated Charcoal and came across Schmidt’s.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Schmidt's Aluminum Free Natural Deodorant in the Fresh Fir & Spice scent has truly been a game-changer in my daily routine. This 3-pack of deodorants is a reliable companion that offers 24-hour odor protection. What sets it apart is its commitment to being certified natural, vegan, and cruelty-free.Upon using it, I was pleasantly surprised by its effectiveness. The Fresh Fir & Spice fragrance is invigorating and long-lasting, making me feel refreshed throughout the day. Unlike some other deodorants, Schmidt's doesn't contain any harmful aluminum compounds, which gives me peace of mind knowing I'm using a safer product.The deodorant applies smoothly and dries quickly, leaving no sticky residue. Its natural ingredients are gentle on my skin, making it suitable for both women and men. I appreciate the fact that it doesn't irritate my skin, even after prolonged use.One of the best aspects of this product is that it keeps me feeling fresh and confident in various situations, from busy workdays to intense workouts. I've even received compliments on the delightful scent. It's clear that Schmidt's has put a lot of thought and care into creating a deodorant that not only works exceptionally well but also aligns with ethical and natural principles.In summary, Schmidt's Aluminum Free Natural Deodorant in Fresh Fir & Spice is a must-have for anyone looking for an effective, safe, and eco-conscious deodorant option. It has become an essential part of my daily routine, and I couldn't be happier with the results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the best deodorant!
reviews.reviewText: This deodorant works so good. I accidentally forgot to put deodorant one day and you couldn’t tell. I like that it’s odorless and doesn’t clash with my perfume. You can put your arms up with confidence knowing there will be no odor or color…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product overall
reviews.reviewText: Great product overall, I use on a daily basis for a month or so now and I have to say it smells great and is long lasting. One problem I do have with it is that it is soft at room temperature so it goes on a little messy but no game changer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only aluminum free deodorant that works
reviews.reviewText: I loveeee this deodorant. It’s the only non toxic option that actually works on me. The smell is amazing too. I’m 23 yo and work out 5x a week and have no problems. I love this stuff. I’ve tried so many other brands and the crystal deodorant. This is hands down the best I’ve tried.
Nice scent and provides great protection - the best out of many natural deodorants I’ve tried. Over time the charcoal does discolour white shirts a bit, but it’s worth the trade off in my opinion

Smell is great! I sweat a lot but find this works well. I sometimes need to reapply in the hot summer if I’m going out in the evening. I did have a reaction when I first started using (my armpits got red and itchy) but I haven’t had an issue for about 2 years now.
Tried 2 types. Works well. Love the lavender. A slight fresh scent and all day protection
